section.p: Use a function to create a random distribution of 85 shoe sizes from the range 37 to 43). After that make a frequency distribution and calculate average, median, modus, variance and standard deviation.

section.title: Solution
section.p: First create a table with two columns. In de first column the shoe sizes 37, 38, …, 43. In the second column the probability. Each shoe size has the same probability, so 1/7.

Then generate the shoe size with Tab Data Data Analysis (group Analyze) Random Number Generation . Specify 1 variable, 85 random numbers, discrete distribution, value and probability input range and a cell for the start of the output range.
Create a histogram with the values 37, 38, …, 43 as bin range.

Then generate the shoe size with Tab Data Data Analysis (group Analyze) Descriptive statistics . Specify the range with generated numbers as input range, grouped by columns, summary statistics and a cell for the start of the output range.
